mapper.insert: insert into freeboard (title, contents, uid, likeCount, isNotice, regiTime, isGroup, groupNo, boardNo) values(#{title}, #{contents}, #{uid}, #{likeCount}, #{isNotice}, now(), #{isGroup}, #{groupNo}, #{boardNo});
mapper.select: select articleNo, nickname,title, regiTime, likeCount from freeboard fb join userinfo ui on fb.uid = ui.uid order by articleNo desc
select articleNo, title, contents, nickname, likeCount,isNotice, regiTime, isGroup, groupNo, boardNo from freeboard fb join userinfo ui on fb.uid = ui.uid where articleNo = #{articleNo}
select articleNo, nickname,title, regiTime, likeCount from freeboard fb join userinfo ui on fb.uid = ui.uid where title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
select articleNo, nickname,title, regiTime, likeCount from freeboard fb join userinfo ui on fb.uid = ui.uid where nickname = #{nickname}
